diagnosis.final_diagnosis: 2019 novel coronavirus infection (COVID-19) presenting as mild pneumonia
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The patient presented with fever, non-productive cough, and a travel history to Wuhan, China, which indicated a viral pneumonia. Laboratory investigations, including negative swabs for other respiratory viruses and detection of coronavirus in mid-turbinate and throat swabs by PCR, confirmed the diagnosis as 2019-nCoV.
